verbose_text: Importantly, IL-6 trans-signaling via IL-6 / soluble IL-6 receptor (sIL-6R) complexes, but not classic signaling via IL-6 / membrane bound IL-6 receptor (IL-6R) complexes has been shown to prevent the apoptosis of T cells and promote tissue damage.
evidence: IL-6 receptor (IL-6R) complexes has been shown to prevent the apoptosis
